The Committee

The Committee 18/19 (Current)

The Leeds Hacking Society committee is made up of 5 members who are all current students at Leeds Beckett University. Together we help organise sessions, plan events, and reach out to industry for visits, talks, and career opportunities.

Charlotte Howarth

President

Nick Simpson

Vice President

Matt Anderson

Secretary

Laura Whittaker

Treasurer
